Impinj.OctaneSdk.TruncatedReplySettings Class Reference

Class containing the settings for using Truncated Reply during Inventory. More...

 Select a starting bit location in the EPC memory bank that will be used for the truncating select command. More...
 
byte EpcLengthInWords [get, set]
 The EPC length, in 16-bit words, of all tags in the field of view. If Gen2V2TagsOnly is true, only tags with EPCs of this length can reply
and tags with EPCs that are not this length will be ignored. More...
 
bool Gen2v2TagsOnly [get, set]
 If only Gen2v2 tags are in the field of view then setting the Gen2v2TagsOnly flag will perform an additional CRC check to further validate the integrity of the tag response. If this flag is enabled non-Gen2v2 tags will be ignored. More...
 
bool IsEnabled [get, set]
 Flag indicating whether the Truncated Reply feature is enabled. More...
 
string TagMask [get, set]
 Specifies the mask that must match the EPC memory bank starting at Pointer. The end of the mask defines the start location of EPC reported by the tag. If the RO Spec contains C1G2Filters then the length of TagMask must be 0. Filter validation is disabled when truncated reply is used. More...

Detailed Description

Class containing the settings for using Truncated Reply during Inventory.

Property Documentation

◆ BitPointer

ushort Impinj.OctaneSdk.TruncatedReplySettings.BitPointer
getset

Select a starting bit location in the EPC memory bank that will be used for the truncating select command.

◆ EpcLengthInWords

byte Impinj.OctaneSdk.TruncatedReplySettings.EpcLengthInWords
getset

The EPC length, in 16-bit words, of all tags in the field of view. If Gen2V2TagsOnly is true, only tags with EPCs of this length can reply
and tags with EPCs that are not this length will be ignored.

◆ Gen2v2TagsOnly

bool Impinj.OctaneSdk.TruncatedReplySettings.Gen2v2TagsOnly
getset

If only Gen2v2 tags are in the field of view then setting the Gen2v2TagsOnly flag will perform an additional CRC check to further validate the integrity of the tag response. If this flag is enabled non-Gen2v2 tags will be ignored.

◆ IsEnabled

bool Impinj.OctaneSdk.TruncatedReplySettings.IsEnabled
getset

Flag indicating whether the Truncated Reply feature is enabled.

◆ TagMask

string Impinj.OctaneSdk.TruncatedReplySettings.TagMask
getset

Specifies the mask that must match the EPC memory bank starting at Pointer. The end of the mask defines the start location of EPC reported by the tag. If the RO Spec contains C1G2Filters then the length of TagMask must be 0. Filter validation is disabled when truncated reply is used.
